imgDesc.text:
Use <color=#ffe14b>two crystal "receiver nodes"</color> to create a <color=#ffe14b>bidirectional</color> valve. Though it is not the original design or intended use, the energy of the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus can push the receiver nodes, adjusting the valve direction clockwise or counterclockwise, and operating it and associated mechanisms in this way.
Sometimes the missing receiver nodes need to be found.
